bibl.title: The Function of the Paragraphus in Greek Literary Prose Texts.
bibl.note: "My suggestion is that the paragraphus in Greek prose texts was added primarily to assist with reading aloud - the typical way in which these literary texts would have been used." Uses mainly Oxyrhynchus examples.
